p: In part I, a filtration device introduced by Talvitie et al. ( 2015) was built and used with nylon net with mesh size of 250 Î¼m. Spiked sludge samples were diluted with 3 L of tap water before filtration (Talvitie et al. 2017b), all spiked samples were filtered through the device and filters were carefully transferred into petri dishes. Filters were let dry at room temperature (RT) with a loose foil cover before examination.
